dt-option.name: firstDay
dt-option.summary: Change which day of the week is first on the calendar.

type.description: This value represents which day of the week should be in the first column of datetime.

dt-option.default:
The default value of 0 represents Monday - the days are 0 indexed starting from Monday:
* 0 - Monday * 1 - Tuesday * 2 - Wednesday * 3 - Thursday * 4 - Friday * 5 - Saturday * 6 - Sunday
dt-option.description: This option allows for the "first" day to be changed to any of the days of the week as desired.
